entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 10:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
